DBConnection

Class DatabaseOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • DBConnection.DatabaseOperation

  • public final class DatabaseOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has most of the database operation done in the project. Like get data from tables, insert new data to the tables.
    Author:
    Rahmi
